text: Pedro Menéndez de Avilés (15 February 1519 – 17 September 1574) was a Spanish explorer who was famous for exploring St. Augustine. That is in Florida, United States today. Category:1519 births Category:1574 deaths Category:Spanish explorers Category:Admirals Category:16th century in Spain Category:History of Florida
title: Pedro Menéndez de Avilés
